headline: DevOps Engineer | Platform Architect | Infrastructure Automation
professional_summary: DevOps Engineer with 6+ years architecting cloud infrastructure and automating deployment pipelines for high-scale applications. Expert in Kubernetes, Terraform, and CI/CD implementation. Reduced deployment times by 85% and infrastructure costs by 40% through innovative automation solutions. Strong advocate for infrastructure-as-code and GitOps methodologies.

featured_projects.name: Kubernetes Multi-Tenant Platform
featured_projects.description: Designed and implemented multi-tenant Kubernetes platform serving 50+ development teams
featured_projects.challenges: Needed to provide isolated environments while maintaining cost efficiency and security
featured_projects.solution: Built custom operators for namespace provisioning, implemented RBAC with OPA policies, and created self-service portal
impact: Reduced environment provisioning time from 2 days to 5 minutes

featured_projects.name: Zero-Downtime Migration Framework
featured_projects.description: Orchestrated migration of 200+ microservices from on-premise to AWS cloud
featured_projects.challenges: Migrate production services without customer impact while maintaining data consistency
featured_projects.solution: Implemented blue-green deployment strategy with automated rollback capabilities and real-time sync
impact: Completed migration with zero customer-facing downtime

featured_projects.name: GitOps CI/CD Pipeline Automation
featured_projects.description: Revolutionized deployment process using GitOps principles and automated pipelines
featured_projects.challenges: Manual deployments were error-prone and took 4+ hours per release
featured_projects.solution: Implemented ArgoCD with GitHub Actions, automated testing, and progressive delivery
impact: Reduced deployment time from 4 hours to 15 minutes

featured_projects.name: Infrastructure Cost Optimization Tool
featured_projects.description: Open-source tool for analyzing and optimizing cloud infrastructure costs
featured_projects.challenges: Teams lacked visibility into resource usage and cost allocation
featured_projects.solution: Built Python-based analyzer with recommendations engine and Slack integration
impact: Helped organizations save average of 30% on cloud costs

experience.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
highlights: Architected Kubernetes-based platform supporting 1B+ requests daily with 99.99% uptime
Led infrastructure team of 4 engineers, mentoring on IaC best practices and automation
Implemented comprehensive monitoring stack reducing MTTR from 45 to 8 minutes
Automated security scanning in CI/CD pipeline, catching 95% of vulnerabilities pre-production

experience.title: DevOps Engineer
highlights: Migrated 50+ applications to containerized architecture using Docker and Kubernetes
Built Terraform modules for standardized infrastructure provisioning across teams
Reduced AWS costs by 40% through reserved instances and spot fleet optimization
Established disaster recovery procedures with RTO of 1 hour and RPO of 15 minutes

experience.title: Junior DevOps Engineer
highlights: Automated server provisioning using Ansible, reducing setup time from days to hours
Implemented centralized logging with ELK stack for 100+ servers
Maintained Jenkins pipelines for continuous integration and deployment

open_source.contribution: Contributed to ingress-nginx controller, fixing memory leak issue
Maintainer of terraform-aws-eks module with 2M+ downloads
Added custom metrics support for StatefulSets
